\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&&& {Q_l} & {M_{\varphi (l)}} \\
	{Q_i} && {Q_{\varphi (i)}} && {Q_{j}} && {Q_{\varphi (j)}} \\
	& {M_{\varphi (i)}} && {M_{j}} && {M_{\varphi (j)}}
	\arrow[from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=1-4]
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=2-1, to=3-2]
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=2-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow[Rightarrow, from=2-5, to=2-7]
	\arrow[from=2-5, to=3-6]
	\arrow[dashed, from=2-7, to=1-4]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=2-3]
	\arrow[from=3-2, to=3-4]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow[from=3-4, to=3-6]
	\arrow[from=3-6, to=2-7]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
